audios.title: I’m Taking Care of You Today
audios.notes: After a long day at work, you look forward to seeing your girlfriend, but she isn’t feeling too bright. So, you make it your priority to shower her in love and care!
audios.author: u/jlxzon

audios.title: Comforted by the Cute Boba Barista
audios.notes: When the boba cutie you've been chatting with for months sees you come in all upset he takes his break and tries to find out what's wrong and if he can fix it.
audios.author: u/GlitterGothBunny
audios.tags: [Script Fill] [SFW] [Sweet] [Curvy Listener] [Acquaintance 2 More] [Comfort] for being followed and grabbed and also [Insecurities] cute [Confession]
